title: Warriors-Rockets, Lakers, Jeanie Buss, and Kyrie Irving
itunes:title: Warriors-Rockets, Lakers, Jeanie Buss, and Kyrie Irving
description:
Colin explains why the Golden State Warriors are a great team and the Houston Rockets are just a good team. Colin also discusses why Boston Celtics G Kyrie Irving wasn't a good fit and why the Los Angeles Lakers still don't have a head coach. Guest include Chris Broussard, Arash Markazi, Kendrick Perkins, and Cuttino Mobley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
